description:
Hello Bristol Gophers 👋!

We're coming back - and in person.

Speakers:

🗣️ Alexander Jophus Trelore - Building a k8s operator

An operator in the k8s world allows users to more easily control what is being run and how. Allowing users to take care of day 1 (installation and configuration) and day 2 (maintenance, reconfiguration, etc..) tasks. We'll explore how to build our own for our own needs, when you should build one and how.

Alexander is a senior software engineer at Cast AI. He helps run the meetup! In his free time, he can be found tinkering with all sorts of tech. Recently getting into home automation.

⏰ Schedule:

* 18:00-18:05 intro/welcome
* 18:05-18:35 first speaker
* 18:35-18:45 small break
* 18:45-19:15 second speaker
* 19:15-19:30 farewell/next event info

❤️ Sponsors
\- Tumelo \(venue\)
\- TBC \(food/drinks\)
\- Ardan Labs \(Raffling Ultimate Go Bundle\)

📣 Help us grow! JetBrains offers free licences to meet-ups with attendance greater than 30. If we can reach this, we will apply and be handing it out as a prize at events.

📍 - Runway East
title: Go - In Person
